about_the_game:
The forest is no safe place, where predators hide in every bush and even the trees have eyes.
Young elven warriors must prove themselves against the fierce creatures that lurk in their woodland realm.

Add new content to Deckbuilder Fantasy:
A new campaign region
25 new cards
5 new relics
2 playable characters

Young elven warriors must prove themselves against the fierce creatures that lurk in their woodland realm.

name: Deckbuilder Fantasy - Elvenglade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
